```{r tglan, cache=cacheon}

geo <- tg_lan %>%
  filter(!is.na(region)) %>%
  mutate(
    prev_cat = case_when(
      prev <= 5 ~ 1,
      prev <= 10 ~ 2,
      prev <= 20 ~ 3,
      prev <= 30 ~ 4,
      prev <= 40 ~ 5,
      prev <= 50 ~ 6,
      prev <= 60 ~ 7
    ),
    inc_cat = case_when(
      inc <= 5 ~ 1,
      inc <= 10 ~ 2,
      inc <= 20 ~ 3,
      inc <= 30 ~ 4,
      inc <= 40 ~ 5,
      inc <= 50 ~ 6,
      inc <= 60 ~ 7
    ),
    regnums = str_sub(X1, 1, 2),
    region_mapnr = case_when(
      regnums == "01" ~ 15,
      regnums == "03" ~ 16,
      regnums == "04" ~ 14,
      regnums == "05" ~ 12,
      regnums == "06" ~ 7,
      regnums == "07" ~ 9,
      regnums == "08" ~ 8,
      regnums == "09" ~ 4,
      regnums == "10" ~ 1,
      regnums == "12" ~ 13,
      regnums == "13" ~ 5,
      regnums == "14" ~ 21,
      regnums == "17" ~ 17,
      regnums == "18" ~ 11,
      regnums == "19" ~ 20,
      regnums == "20" ~ 2,
      regnums == "21" ~ 3,
      regnums == "22" ~ 19,
      regnums == "23" ~ 6,
      regnums == "24" ~ 18,
      regnums == "25" ~ 10
    )
  )
```
